HotelElement.Name: Holiday Inn Madrid Calle Alcala (Formerly Velada Madrid)

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Holiday Inn Madrid Calle Alcala in Madrid (Ciudad Lineal), you'll be close to Alcala Norte and Madrid Congress Centre. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Arturo Soria Plaza Shopping Center and Centro Comercial Campo de las Naciones.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 261 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and pay movies provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs feature bidets and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities, including an indoor pool, a sauna, and a fitness center. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, a hair salon, and wedding services.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and 24-hour room service is provided. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Madrid? This hotel has facilities measuring 20451 square feet (1841 square meters), including conference space. A roundtrip airport shuttle is complimentary during limited hours.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and 24-hour room service is provided. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

The preferred airport for Holiday Inn Madrid Calle Alcala is Madrid (MAD-Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas) - 6.2 km / 3.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
